General.Name: Hapbee Technologies Inc
General.Description: Hapbee Technologies, Inc., a digital wellness technology company, develops, markets, and sells wearable wellness devices that delivers ultra-low radio frequency energy signals to produce mood-altering effects. Its products include Hapbee Neckband and Hapbee Smart Sleep Pad designed to produce sensations, such as happy, alert, relax, calm, sleep, and focus. The company was formerly known as Elevation Technologies, Inc. and changed its name to Hapbee Technologies, Inc. in May 2020. Hapbee Technologies, Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9
